data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Zacatecas, Mexico, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zacatecas, Mexico
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 142,892 believers in Zacatecas, Mexico to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Zacatecas, Mexico.
data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself real to these new families.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Zacatecas that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Zacatecas to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Huichol people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Huichol people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Huichol people is yours.
Spirit, help the fearful in Zacatecas, Mexico to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Zacatecas.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Zacatecas, Mexico.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

location.name: Zacatecas
location.cities_list: Zacatecas, Guadalupe, Fresnillo, Jerez de García Salinas, Río Grande
location.cities_list_w_pop: Zacatecas (129,011), Guadalupe (124,623), Fresnillo (120,944), Jerez de García Salinas (43,064), Río Grande (32,944)
